projects.name: Which Comment should I Look? A Data Driven Analysis on Reviews from the Developers' Standpoint
projects.summary: Shenghan Gao, Mingzheng Wu, Supervised by Prof. Haipeng Zhang
highlights: Lead a quantitative study on feature importance from developers' perspective, taking Steam as the user scenarios.
Propose two indicators to evaluate the value of comments from the developers' corresponding reviews.
Utilize traditional methods, like Pearson coefficient, and recommendation models with XAI techniques, like SHAP, to quantize the importance of features.
